entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
